name: Claudio
description:
Controls - Arrow keys or WASD to move. SPACE to jump.

Make your way to your spaceship resting on top of the clouds without touching the planet below. Hurry before a meteor strikes the planet after time runs out.

Team Members

Kekleon and Reprevise - Programming
xhelyx - Planets and Clouds
Legion - 3D Character
DenLatino - Concept Art, planets, space ships, UI art
